name: Cooking From the Glossies: Basil Limeade Slushies
description: My cousin who lives in Flushing has the luxury of a backyard that's grown to become about fifty percent garden, one hundred percent fun times. This leads to an inevitable feast (or famine, if they're not ripe yet) of zucchini,...
recipeIngredient: 1 cup lightly packed basil leave, plus basil sprigs, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, blend all the ingredients until slushy.
Pour the limeade into chilled glasses and garnish with basil sprigs.
